title: place.address
description:
The address the [place](https://docs.publiq.be/docs/uitdatabank/models/place) is located at. Localized because some parts like the municipality or street address can be different in Dutch, French, German and/or English.

Requires at least one locale, specifically the one defined in the [mainLanguage](./place-mainLanguage.json) of the place.

**Only add a localized version if it's an official variant!**
